sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'
import { Text, View } from 'react-native'
import SelectBox from 'react-native-multi-selectbox'
import { xorBy } from 'lodash'

const items = [
    {id: 1, name: 'Ark Bloc'},
    {id: 2, name: 'b8A'},
    {id: 3, name: 'BFF Climb (Bukit Timah)'},
    {id: 4, name: 'BFF Climb (Bendemeer)'},
    {id: 5, name: 'Boruda'},
    {id: 6, name: 'Boulder Movement (Bugis+)'},
    {id: 7, name: 'Boulder Movement (OUE Downtown)'},
    {id: 8, name: 'Boulder Movement (Suntec City Mall)'},
    {id: 9, name: 'Boulder Movement (Tai Seng+)'},
    {id: 10, name: 'Boulder Movement (Tekka Place)'},
    {id: 11, name: 'Boulder+ (Aperia Mall)'},
    {id: 12, name: 'Boulder+ (The Chevrons)'},
    {id: 13, name: 'Boulder Planet'},
    {id: 14, name: 'Boulder Planet (Rochor)'},
    {id: 15, name: 'Boulder World'},
    {id: 16, name: 'Boulder World (Paragon)'},
    {id: 17, name: 'Boys Town Adventure Centre'},
    {id: 18, name: 'Climb Central (Katong)'},
    {id: 19, name: 'Climb Central (Novena)'},
    {id: 20, name: 'Climb Central (Sports Hub)'},
    {id: 21, name: 'Climb Central (Funan)'},
    {id: 22, name: 'Clip n Climb'},
    {id: 23, name: 'Fit Bloc (Depot Heights)'},
    {id: 24, name: 'Fit Bloc (Kent Ridge)'},
    {id: 25, name: 'Ground Up Climbing'},
    {id: 26, name: 'Kinetics'},
    {id: 27, name: 'Lighthouse Climbing'},
    {id: 28, name: 'Origin Boulder'},
    {id: 29, name: 'OYEYO Bouldering Home'},
    {id: 30, name: 'Passion Wave (Pasir Ris)'},
    {id: 31, name: 'SAFRA Adventure Sports Centre'},
    {id: 32, name: 'T-Hall.sg'},
    {id: 33, name: 'The Cliff @ Snow City'},
    {id: 34, name: 'The Rock School (Our Tampines Hub)'},
    {id: 35, name: 'UpWall Climbing'},
    {id: 36, name: 'Z-Vertigo Boulder Gym'},
]

function Filter() {
    const [selectedTeam, setSelectedTeam] = useState({})
    const [selectedTeams, setSelectedTeams] = useState([])
    return (
      <View style={{ margin: 30 }}>
        <View style={{ width: '100%', alignItems: 'center' }}>
          <Text style={{ fontSize: 30, paddingBottom: 20 }}>Demos</Text>
        </View>
        <Text style={{ fontSize: 20, paddingBottom: 10 }}>Select Demo</Text>
        <SelectBox
          label="Select single"
          options={items}
          value={selectedTeam}
          onChange={onChange()}
          hideInputFilter={false}
        />
        <View style={{ height: 40 }} />
        <Text style={{ fontSize: 20, paddingBottom: 10 }}>MultiSelect Demo</Text>
        <SelectBox
          label="Select multiple"
          options={items}
          selectedValues={selectedTeams}
          onMultiSelect={onMultiChange()}
          onTapClose={onMultiChange()}
          isMulti
        />
      </View>
    )
  
    function onMultiChange() {
      return (name) => setSelectedTeams(xorBy(selectedTeams, [name], 'id'))
    }
  
    function onChange() {
      return (val) => setSelectedTeam(val)
    }
  }
  
  export default Filter
